headline: What Makes Kimberly-Clark (KMB) a Safe Haven in a Turbulent Dividend Market?
summary: Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) is included among the 10 Oversold Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In June, the company announced a strategic partnership with Suzano S.A. to establish a global tissue and professional products company. This move is viewed as a way for Kimberly-Clark to sharpen its focus on higher-growth, higher-margin segments. By […]
